stepTitle: A $$0.240-kg$$ billiard ball that is moving at $$3.00$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ strikes the bumper of a pool table and bounces straight back at $$2.40$$ $$\frac{m}{s}$$ (80% of its original speed). The collision lasts $$0.0150$$ s.
stepBody: Calculate the average force exerted on the ball by the bumper.
